feed.title: Ghost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.106.1
entry.content:
• ✨ Added support for line breaks in more editor card fields (credit: @cathysarisky) - renovate[bot]
  • ✨ Added option to disable free signups (#21862) - Sag
  • 🎨 Made 5 settings quicker to edit at the top-level in Settings (#21976) - Daniël van der Winden
  • 🎨 Improved Access card layout in Settings (#21920) - Daniël van der Winden
  • 🎨 Improved Access card layout in Settings (#21913) - Daniël van der Winden
  • 🐛 Fixed post list not displaying correctly with long titles (#21892) - Daniël van der Winden
  • 🐛 Fixed archived newsletters visible in Portal when email disabled (#21737) - Ronald Langeveld
  • 🌐 Updated Italian translations (#21905) - Alessandro Massone
  • 🌐 Added Latvian translations (#21852) - GGLVXD
  • 🌐 Updated Turkish translations (#21822) - echobilisim3421
  • 🌐 Updated Catalan translations (#21830) - Àlex Rodríguez Bacardit
  • 🌐 Updated Vietnamese translations (#21771) - Duy

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.105.0...v5.106.1

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.107.0
entry.content:
• ✨ Updated Comments likes UI changes to be instant (#21861) - Ronald Langeveld
  • 🎨 Optimised SQL query for exporting members (#22017) - Princi Vershwal
  • 🎨 Admin visual design updates (#21987) - Peter Zimon
  • 🐛 Fixed custom view not showing edit button in bad state (#22002) - Ronald Langeveld

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.106.1...v5.107.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.106.2
entry.content:
